trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Hillsboro
There was one other sighting in Hillsboro on or around September 22nd 2003
divs: Sighting DetailsAt around 10 or 11 pm Friday evening, my 11 year old daughter and a friend werewalking up her driveway when they stated that an huge round object with lightsall around it approached them over top of them and two lights beamed down onthem. They heard no noises like a plain or helicopter. It shined on them for afew seconds then it turned the lights off and then dissappeared. It came fromthe East then dissappeared towards the west.
